contents:
不稀奇，谷歌前两年还跟中共一起搞过“蜻蜓项目”(Project Dragonfly) 呢，要在中国上一个审查版的搜索引擎，还把用户的信息和搜索记录绑定起来，后来被泄露出来，迫于压力才停止。

The Dragonfly search engine was reportedly designed to link users' phone numbers to their search queries and censor websites such as Wikipedia and those that publish information about freedom of speech, human rights, democracy, religion, and other issues considered sensitive by the Chinese government.

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dragonfly_(search_engine)
